segments.text: I see a woman drying a plate, completely oblivious to the chaos brewing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink flows over the edge, pooling at her feet, and yet she continues to focus on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows the trouble her children are getting into just a few steps away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool stretches his arm toward the cookie jar with an insatiable eagerness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand clutches a plate like it’s a precious trophy, ready for the sweets he desires.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl below, arm outstretched, her expression a mix of anticipation and hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet moment, yet I can’t help but feel a knot in my stomach as I think about the tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
